title: WTB/WTTF 1887 N284 Buchner of Sam Crane
author: ValKehl

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF 1887 N284 Buchner of Sam Crane
posts.post_content: I'm looking for a N284 Buchner Gold Coin card of Sam Crane, Short Stop, Washington. A low grade card is okay, if it has nice eye appeal. I'm looking to upgrade my current example (see below) which, understandably, SGC would not grade. If you have one you are willing to part with, kindly send me pics at [url]ekehl333@aol.com[/url].

You can let me know if you are ready 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

[quote name="ninadarian97" post=2521746]You can let me know if you are ready 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk[/QUOTE]

It is not clear to me what you mean by your post. Please explain.

[quote name="ValKehl" post=2521877]It is not clear to me what you mean by your post. Please explain.[/QUOTE]

I just now saw the email you sent me, which reads:
"I have an old judge Sam Crane if you would be interested. 
Sent from my iPhone"

As stated in my original post, I'm looking for an N284 of Sam Crane, not a N172.

[quote name="Lucas00" post=2521879]Pretty certain that's a scammer.[/QUOTE]

Absolutely one.  Even has a "my dad has this one" post.
